mapper.delete: delete from t_plan_detail where plan_detail_id = #{planDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_plan_detail (waybill_plan_id, goods_id, sub_goods_id, goods_name, goods_spec, unit, min_unit, unit_data, plan_amount, remainder_amount, freight_price, freight_total, create_id, create_name, create_date, update_id, update_name, update_time, is_deleted, detail_remark, company_id,pay_price,pay_total ) values (#{waybillPlanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{subGoodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{unitData,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{planAmount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{remainderAmount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{freightPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{freightTotal,jdbcType=REAL}, #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{detailRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{payPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{payTotal,jdbcType=REAL} )
mapper.update: update t_plan_detail set waybill_plan_id = #{waybillPlanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sub_goods_id = #{subGoodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_spec = #{goodsSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, min_unit = #{minUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_data = #{unitData,jdbcType=BIGINT}, plan_amount = #{planAmount,jdbcType=REAL}, remainder_amount = #{remainderAmount,jdbcType=REAL}, freight_price = #{freightPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, freight_total = #{freightTotal,jdbcType=REAL}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_name = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_name = #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, detail_remark = #{detailRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where plan_detail_id = #{planDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select plan_detail_id, waybill_plan_id, goods_id, sub_goods_id, goods_name, goods_spec, unit, plan_amount,min_unit,unit_data, remainder_amount, freight_price, freight_total, create_id, create_name, create_date, update_id, update_name, update_time, is_deleted, detail_remark, company_id,pay_price,pay_total from t_plan_detail where plan_detail_id = #{planDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select plan_detail_id, waybill_plan_id, goods_id, sub_goods_id, goods_name, goods_spec, unit, plan_amount, remainder_amount, freight_price, freight_total, create_id, create_name, create_date,min_unit,unit_data, update_id, update_name, update_time, is_deleted, detail_remark, company_id,pay_price,pay_total from t_plan_detail where plan_detail_id = #{planDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select plan_detail_id, waybill_plan_id, goods_id, sub_goods_id, goods_name, goods_spec, unit, plan_amount, remainder_amount, freight_price, freight_total, create_id, create_name, create_date,min_unit,unit_data, update_id, update_name, update_time, is_deleted, detail_remark, company_id,pay_price,pay_total from t_plan_detail
mapper.insert:
insert into t_plan_detail (waybill_plan_id, goods_id, sub_goods_id, goods_name, goods_spec, unit, plan_amount, remainder_amount, freight_price, freight_total, create_id, create_name, create_date, update_id, update_name, update_time, is_deleted, detail_remark, company_id,pay_price,pay_total,min_unit,unit_data ) values
(#{goods.waybillPlanId}, #{goods.goodsId}, #{goods.subGoodsId}, #{goods.goodsName}, #{goods.goodsSpec}, #{goods.unit}, #{goods.planAmount}, #{goods.remainderAmount}, #{goods.freightPrice}, #{goods.freightTotal}, #{goods.createId}, #{goods.createName}, #{goods.createDate}, #{goods.updateId}, #{goods.updateName}, #{goods.updateTime}, #{goods.isDeleted}, #{goods.detailRemark}, #{goods.companyId}, #{goods.payPrice}, #{goods.payTotal},#{goods.minUnit},#{goods.unitData} )

update.foreach: update t_plan_detail set waybill_plan_id = #{goods.waybillPlanId}, goods_id = #{goods.goodsId}, sub_goods_id = #{goods.subGoodsId}, goods_name = #{goods.goodsName}, goods_spec = #{goods.goodsSpec}, unit = #{goods.unit}, min_unit = #{goods.minUnit}, unit_data = #{goods.unitData}, plan_amount = #{goods.planAmount}, remainder_amount = #{goods.remainderAmount}, freight_price = #{goods.freightPrice}, freight_total = #{goods.freightTotal}, update_id = #{goods.updateId}, update_name = #{goods.updateName}, update_time = #{goods.updateTime}, is_deleted = #{goods.isDeleted}, detail_remark = #{goods.detailRemark} where plan_detail_id = #{goods.planDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and company_id = #{goods.companyId}
